content: gap knit 3 rounds of stockinette work 6 7 8 p2tog p1 turn repeats of main repeat chart or written instructions until bor continue repeating repeat row 3 and 4 until 16 18 20 sts row 1-8 until desired length of leg remain stopping after completing row 8 stop 4 2 gusset 4 sts before bor proceed to dividing sts for heel flap k 9 10 11 sts this position is the new beginning of the round bor in the middle of the heel place a special bor marker heel flap setup round 1 k across the 9 10 11 divide sts as follows work row 1 of remaining heel sts then pick up and knit appropriate size top of foot chart over the 12 14 18 sts in edge of heel flap place next 24 28 32 sts and the remaining 24 marker 28 32 sts for the heel flap work next row of appropriate size top of note there are 4 2 4 edge sts on each foot chart over 24 28 32 sts side and 2 3 3 repeats of 8 sts in place marker pick up and knit 12 14 18 sts between follow chart or written in edge of heel flap k across 9 10 11 sts instructions for top of foot 64 74 88 sts total 5 gusset decreases round 1 k until 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker work next row of appropriate size top of foot chart slip marker ssk k until end of round round 2 k until marker slip marker work next row of appropriate size top of foot chart slip marker k until end of round repeat the last 2 rounds until 48 58 64 sts remain foot of sock k until marker slip marker work as finishing established repeating row 1-8 over top of foot slip marker k until end of round graft 16 20 24 sts sts together using your preferred grating technique or as follows continue until desired length or 1 5 inches / 3 8 cm from finished length kitchener for knit/ stockinette front needle insert tapestry needle knitwise toe drop the stitch front needle insert tapestry needle purlwise decrease round k until 3 sts before marker leave the stitch on the needle k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk k until 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 back needle insert tapestry needle purlwise ssk k until end of round drop the stitch next round knit back needle insert tapestry needle knitwise leave the stitch on the needle repeat last 2 rounds until 16 22 24 sts remain weave in ends with tapestry needle soak socks in lukewarm water for 15 - 20 minutes size medium only k until marker slip press out water with a towel place on sock marker k1 ssk k until 3 sts before marker blockers or lay flat to air dry k2tog k1 16 20 24 sts remain enjoy your passion-knit socks 6 copyright kayla baldwin
